trans-unit.source: Compares two objects for equivalence, ignoring the case of strings.
trans-unit.target: Compara dois objetos de equivalência, a ignorar as maiúsculas e minúsculas de cadeias.

trans-unit.source: CaseInsensitiveComparer implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface supporting case-insensitive comparisons on strings, just as <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> interface supporting case-insensitive comparisons on strings.
trans-unit.target: CaseInsensitiveComparer implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>interface suporte comparações sensível em cadeias, tal como <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>interface sensível comparações de suporte em cadeias.</xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Comparer> class is the default implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface and performs case-sensitive string comparisons.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.Comparer>classe é a implementação predefinida do <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>interface e efetua comparações de cadeias de maiúsculas e minúsculas.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> </xref:System.Collections.Comparer>

trans-unit.source: The objects used as keys by a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> are required to override the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method (or the <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> interface) and the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method (or the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface).
trans-unit.target: Os objectos utilizados como chaves por um <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>são necessários para substituir o <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método (ou o <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>interface) e o <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método (ou o <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>interface).</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> </xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of both methods or interfaces must handle case sensitivity the same way; otherwise, the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> might behave incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de métodos ou as interfaces deve processar sensibilidade às maiúsculas e minúsculas da mesma forma; caso contrário, o <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>poderá comportar-se incorretamente.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: For example, when creating a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>, you must use this class with the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> class or any case-insensitive <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando criar um <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>, tem de utilizar esta classe com o <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>classe ou qualquer sensível <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>implementação.</xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Comparações de cadeias poderão produzir resultados diferentes consoante a cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre comparações de cultura específicos, consulte o <xref:System.Globalization>espaço de nomes e [globalização e localização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> class using the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"> </xref> classe utilizando o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> do thread atual.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> instance is created using this constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread is saved.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>é criada a instância de utilizar este construtor, o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>do thread atual é guardado.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the saved culture to determine the sort order and casing rules; therefore, string comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Procedimentos de comparação utilizam a cultura guardada para determinar a ordem sort e regras de maiúsculas e minúsculas; Por conseguinte, comparações de cadeias poderão produzir resultados diferentes consoante a cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre comparações de cultura específicos, consulte o <xref:System.Globalization>espaço de nomes e [globalização e localização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"> </xref> classe utilizando especificado <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> to determine the sort order and casing rules.
trans-unit.target: Procedimentos de comparação utilizam especificado <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>para determinar a ordem sort e regras de maiúsculas e minúsculas.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Comparações de cadeias poderão produzir resultados diferentes consoante a cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre comparações de cultura específicos, consulte o <xref:System.Globalization>espaço de nomes e [globalização e localização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> to use for the new <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> a utilizar para o novo <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: culture is .
trans-unit.target: cultureis .

trans-unit.source: Performs a case-insensitive comparison of two objects of the same type and returns a value indicating whether one is less than, equal to, or greater than the other.
trans-unit.target: Efetua uma comparação sensível dos dois objetos do mesmo tipo e devolve um valor que indica se um é menor que, igual ou maior do que outros.

trans-unit.source: If `a` and `b` are both strings, this method uses <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to compare the strings with the casing ignored; otherwise, it uses the <xref:System.IComparable> implementation of either object.
trans-unit.target: Se `a` e `b` estão ambas as cadeias, este método utiliza <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>comparar cadeias com as maiúsculas e minúsculas ignorado; caso contrário, utiliza o <xref:System.IComparable>implementação de um objeto.</xref:System.IComparable> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: That is, if `a` implements <xref:System.IComparable>, then this method returns the result of `a`.
trans-unit.target: Ou seja, se `a` implementa <xref:System.IComparable>, em seguida, este método devolve o resultado da `a`.</xref:System.IComparable>

trans-unit.source: `CompareTo` (`b`); otherwise, if `b` implements <xref:System.IComparable>, then it returns the negated result of `b`.
trans-unit.target: `CompareTo`(`b`); caso contrário, se `b` implementa <xref:System.IComparable>, em seguida, devolve o resultado da negated `b`.</xref:System.IComparable>

trans-unit.source: `CompareTo` (`a`).
trans-unit.target: `CompareTo` (`a`).

trans-unit.source: Comparing `null` with any type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using <xref:System.IComparable>.
trans-unit.target: Comparar `null` com qualquer tipo é permitido e não gere uma exceção ao utilizar <xref:System.IComparable>.</xref:System.IComparable>

trans-unit.source: When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object.
trans-unit.target: Quando a ordenação, `null` considera é inferior a qualquer outro objeto.

trans-unit.source: String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Comparações de cadeias poderão produzir resultados diferentes consoante a cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre comparações de cultura específicos, consulte o <xref:System.Globalization>espaço de nomes e [globalização e localização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O objeto primeiro a comparar.

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O objecto de segundo a comparar.

trans-unit.source: A signed integer that indicates the relative values of a and b, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro com sinal que indica valores relativos de a e b , conforme mostrado na seguinte tabela.

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valor

trans-unit.source: Meaning
trans-unit.target: Significado

trans-unit.source: Less than zero
trans-unit.target: Menor que zero

trans-unit.source: a is less than b, with casing ignored.
trans-unit.target: aé menor que b , com maiúsculas e minúsculas ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: Zero
trans-unit.target: Zero

trans-unit.source: a equals b, with casing ignored.
trans-unit.target: aé igual a b , com maiúsculas e minúsculas ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: Greater than zero
trans-unit.target: Maior que zero

trans-unit.source: a is greater than b, with casing ignored.
trans-unit.target: aé maior do que b , com maiúsculas e minúsculas ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: Neither a nor b implements the interface.
trans-unit.target: Nem a nem b implementa o interface.

trans-unit.source: -or- a and b are of different types.
trans-unit.target: -or- a and b are of different types.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> that is associated with the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread and that is always available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância de <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"> </xref> que se encontra associado a <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> do thread atual e de que está sempre disponível.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> instance is created using the parameterless constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread is saved.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>é criada a instância de utilizar o construtor sem parâmetros, o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>do thread atual é guardado.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the saved culture to determine the sort order and casing rules; therefore, string comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Procedimentos de comparação utilizam a cultura guardada para determinar a ordem sort e regras de maiúsculas e minúsculas; Por conseguinte, comparações de cadeias poderão produzir resultados diferentes consoante a cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre comparações de cultura específicos, consulte o <xref:System.Globalization>espaço de nomes e [globalização e localização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> that is associated with the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"> </xref> que se encontra associado a <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> do thread atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> that is associated with <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and that is always available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância de <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"> </xref> que se encontra associado <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> e que está sempre disponível.

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to determine the sort order and casing rules.
trans-unit.target: Utilizam os procedimentos de comparação de <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para determinar a ordem sort e regras de maiúsculas e minúsculas.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Comparações de cadeias poderão produzir resultados diferentes consoante a cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre comparações de cultura específicos, consulte o <xref:System.Globalization>espaço de nomes e [globalização e localização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> that is associated with <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"> </xref> que se encontra associado <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
